name: enter
word_family: entrance (n. 入口), entry (n. 进入), re-enter (v. 重新进入)
memory_tips: 词根 'ent-' 来自拉丁语 'intrare'，意为 '进入'。联想记忆：想象一个门（entrance）是进入（enter）某个地方的必经之路。图像记忆：画一个人正通过一扇门进入一个房间。

image_prompt.main_image: A person opening a door and stepping into a brightly lit room, with a welcoming atmosphere.
image_prompt.example_image: A girl quietly opening a door and stepping into a cozy room with soft lighting, showing a peaceful and serene environment.
